overview:
Founder + CEO of Clear-Media. Nick focuses on developing ideas, strategies and content platforms.

Creator of Echograph, Clear-Media’s latest product for the iPad. The platform presents a new professional image medium that is the intersection of photography and video content. It’s been called “The Instagram of Animated GIF” by Wired Magazine and selected by Apple as Editor’s Choice in over 100 App Store countries. Echograph also received a few nods from Gizmodo and Fast Company.
